name: module-federation-demo
description: Module Federation with React, Vue, and Angular

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd host && npm install && cd ../react-remote && npm install && cd ../vue-remote && npm install && cd ../angular-remote && npm install
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:host" "npm run start:react" "npm run start:vue" "npm run start:angular"
scripts.build:all: cd host && npm run build && cd ../react-remote && npm run build && cd ../vue-remote && npm run build && cd ../angular-remote && npm run build
